summary: Warts are harmless growths on the skin caused by viruses, mainly HPV. They can appear on hands, feet, or other body parts. Some warts, like genital warts, can be sexually transmitted. Warts often go away on their own but can be treated with acids or freezing. Preventing warts includes wearing shoes in public areas and safe sex practices. Most people get warts at some point, especially children and young adults.
title: Wart
